title: LILBETTER Women Long Sleeve Deep V Neck Loose Plain Long Maxi Casual Dress
description: Material: 95%Rayon 5% Spandex, the fabric is very soft, stretchy and lightweight, super comfortable against to your skin. Note 1:The WHITE color is a little bit see through, pairing a nude, lighter color underwear or a slip with it would be better. Note 2: The Pure "White" dress is a little heavier than the other colors. Note 3: The Floral Print is random, the floral print on each dress may be different, but they are definitely made of same pattern fabric.

Designs: Deep V-neck, long sleeve, side pockets, floor length, empire waist and wrap waist front is greatly appreciated as it has the perfect amount of this yummy fabric cinched and sewn on to the waistline so that it doesn’t cling to you backside and flatten the material out.

The dress can be dressed down but it's super easy to dress it up with a statement necklace and earrings, you will rave enough about the sexy deep v neck and empire waist. And will be more charming and more impress on this full length maxi dress.

This floor length maxi dress is suitable for any occasions: Dress up with your favorite jewelry for a formal even, wedding, party, and dating; it is also perfect choice for casual daily wear, going out, work and so on.
